Scene:
The Sento Palace
(Sentō gosho / 仙洞御所)

Play: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees (義経千本桜)

Production: May 1981



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Tsumaidayū (竹本津梅大夫)

Takemoto Chitosedayū (竹本千歳大夫)

Takemoto Mojitodayū (竹本文字登大夫)

Takemoto Mojiedayū (竹本文字栄大夫)

Takemoto Nanshidayū (竹本南司大夫)

Takemoto Tsukunidayū (竹本津国大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danji (竹沢団治)

Tsuruzawa Enjirō (鶴澤燕二郎)

Nozawa Kin'ya (see also Nozawa Kinshi V) (野澤錦弥)

Tsuruzawa Hachisuke (鶴澤八介)

Nozawa Kichinosuke (see also Takezawa Yasaburō) (野澤吉之助)

Tsuruzawa Asazō V (鶴澤浅造 (五))



Performers:

Puppeteer Character Kashira
Toyomatsu Seinosuke (see also Yoshida Seinosuke)
(豊松清之助) 		Yoshitsune Minamoto
(源義経(九郎判官源義経)) 		Genta
(源太)
Yoshida Tamaya (see also Yoshida Eikō)
(吉田玉也) 		Benkei
(武蔵坊弁慶) 		Ōdanshichi
(大団七)
Yoshida Tamaki
(吉田玉輝) 		Dainoshin Inokuma
(猪熊大之進) 		Hagataki
(端敵)
